name: Star Jumps
description:
Star Jumps

One star must explore all the universe in order to see the one he loves again...

Basic Controls

ActionKeys SetAlternate Key SetMoveA / DLeft / Right Arrow KeysJump / Double JumpW / SpacebarUp Arrow Key / SpacebarWall JumpPress [Jump] while [Moving] towards wall!Quit ProgramEscape (Windows Only)

Psst... Feeling stuck? Press 1-5 above the alphabet keys for level selection and 9 for the ending!
